speaker: CFO
quote: We're still on track to achieve the 1,000 stores by March-25 and 2,000 stores by December-26, as per our guidance, though there could be ups and downs along the way.

speaker: CFO
quote: The board has passed an enabling resolution to raise up to $1 billion, subject to shareholder approval. The actual fundraise size will be dependent on demand and market conditions at that time.

speaker: CFO
quote: The guidance we've given on margins is that we believe this business can reach 4% to 5% (Adjusted EBITDA margin). With every passing quarter, that seems more realistic and achievable to us.

speaker: Blinkit CEO
quote: Today, by GOV, we believe we are the largest player in all the major metros outside of Chennai and Hyderabad. The share of Delhi NCR has fallen from 47% to less than 40%.

speaker: CFO
quote: As far as the profit from operations is concerned, those are still being offset by carry-forward losses, and that will continue for a while. We likely have a couple of years before we need to pay tax on operating income.

speaker: Blinkit CEO
quote: In nearly every city or neighborhood we've entered, we've been positively surprised by the takeoff in the market. Our business is growing more than 120% to 130% year on year.

speaker: CFO
quote: Quick commerce is appealing to a much wider demographic than food delivery. While in terms of absolute MTCs, quick commerce is still small, the overlap is reducing over time.

speaker: Blinkit CEO
quote: Even in categories with slightly higher AOVs, we don't see that much of an upward increment because customers are not making really high involvement purchases on the platform.

speaker: CFO
quote: We need to do what is right for the business first, and we don't think that discounting is going to help our business at this point in time. The fundraise is purely to strengthen the balance sheet.

speaker: CFO
quote: We've always spoken about 20%+ GOV growth as guidance on a CAGR basis over the next few years. I don't think we've ever indicated that the business is likely to grow at 30% in the near term.
